item.title: Trump On 60 Minutes: ‘Political Retribution’ Is What Democrats Did To Me And My Family
item.description: 'You're looking at a man who was indicted many times, and I had to beat the rap. Otherwise I couldn't have run for president.'

item.title: New Mexico’s ‘Free’ Child Care an Attempt to Cover for Past Failures

item.title: The Revolutionary Mood in America Is Getting Worse
item.description: What began as a sense of entitlement is becoming an omnidirectional resentment — of your country, of your government, of your neighbors.

item.title: The Perils of Populism
item.description: As with many dangerous things, the dose makes the poison.
